text: This is a list of noted natural scientists from Romania. ==Agronomists== * Gheorghe Cipăianu - member of Romania's parliament; death in 1957 * Dimitrie Comșa. Of the writers of the Transylvanian Memorandum (en), he got the second- longest prison sentence; honorary member of the Romanian Academy; death in 1931 * Călin Georgescu * Ion Ionescu de la Brad * Gheorghe Ionescu-Sisești * Ioan Kalinderu * Alexandru Moisuc * Păun Otiman * Paul Pîrșan * Cosmin Alin Popescu * Constantin Sandu-Aldea * Nicolae N. Săulescu * Valeriu Tabără * Zoe Țapu - she created an original variety of durum wheat, adapted to the climates such as in Central and Eastern Europe. She was described as a pioneer of durum wheat breeding in Romania. ==Astronomers== * Victor Anestin - he was on of the earliest to write about the possibility of using the atomic power for war purposes; his description was in a novel (of his) published in February 2014 (in the same year as H. G. Wells' The World Set Free).Ion Hobana, "Nuclear War Fiction in Eastern Europe" , in Nuclear Texts and Contexts, Fall 1989 * Noah Brosch * Nicolae Culianu * Nicolae Donici * Mario Livio ==Biologists== * Réka Albert - she is noted for the Barabási–Albert model (en) and research into scale-free networks (en) and Boolean modeling of biological systems. * Ana Aslan * George Assaky - anatomist * Petre Mihai Bănărescu * Dimitrie Brândză * Paul Bujor - anatomist * Nicolae Cajal * Ioan Cantacuzino * Dimitrie Gerota - anatomist * Victor Gomoiu - * Nicolae Leon * Constantin Levaditi * Nicolae Minovici - anatomist * Florentina Mosora * Teodor T. Nalbant * George Emil Palade * Grigore T. Popa - anatomist * Emil Racoviță * Francisc Rainer - anatomist * Henric Sanielevici * Ion Tănăsescu (surgeon) - anatomist * Ion Țuculescu ===Biochemists=== * Mihail Șerban (biochemist) * Sava Dumitrescu ===Botanists=== * Aaron Aaronsohn * Alexandru Borza * Dimitrie Brândză * Anastasie Fătu * Franz Friedrich Fronius * Dimitrie Grecescu * Wilhelm Knechtel * Erasmus Julius Nyárády * Florian Porcius * Alice Săvulescu * Traian Săvulescu * Emanoil C. Teodorescu * Mihail Vlădescu ===Microbiologists=== * Victor Babeș * Ioan Cantacuzino * Toma Ciorbă * Mihai Ciucă * Constantin Ionescu-Mihăești * Constantin Levaditi * Francisc Rainer * Alexandru Slătineanu ===Paleontologists=== * Sava Athanasiu * Grigore Cobălcescu * Gheorghe Macovei * Ion Th. Simionescu * Grigoriu Ștefănescu ===Physiologists=== * George Assaky * Paul Bujor * Dimitrie Călugăreanu * Anastasie Fătu * Nicolae Paulescu * Francisc Rainer ===Zoologists=== * Grigore Antipa * Ioan Borcea - entomologists * Eugen Botezat * Paul Bujor * Dimitrie Călugăreanu * Aristide Caradja - entomologist * Anastasie Fătu * Constantin Kirițescu * Dimitrie Voinov ==Chemists== * Ecaterina Andronescu - chemical engineer * Ion Atanasiu * Emanoil Bacaloglu * Alexandru Balaban * Petru Bogdan * Emilian Bratu - chemical engineer * Constantin Cândea * Traian V. Chirilă * Eugen Chirnoagă * Neculai Costăchescu * Lazăr Edeleanu * Corneliu E. Giurgea * Dan Giușcă * Ionel Haiduc * Constantin Istrati * Ștefan Micle * Ștefan Minovici * Alexandru Mironescu * Ilie G. Murgulescu - physical chemist * Costin Nenițescu * Petru Poni * Dan Ioan Popescu - chemical engineer * Raluca Ripan * Alfons Oscar Saligny * Gheorghe Spacu * Henric Streitman - physical chemist * Corneliu Șumuleanu * Ion Tănăsescu (chemist) * Nicolae Teclu * Attila Verestóy - chemical engineer * Maria Zaharescu ==Earth scientists== * Ștefan Hepites - meteorologists ===Geologists=== * Sava Athanasiu * Marcian Bleahu * Grigore Cobălcescu * Emil Constantinescu * Liviu Constantinescu - geophysicist * Nicolae Frolov * Carmen Gaina - geophysicist * Liviu Giosan * Dan Giușcă * Gheorghe Macovei * Ludovic Mrazek * Petru Poni * Grigoriu Ștefănescu - mineralogists * Emil Racoviță * Ion Th. title: List of Romanian natural scientists
